results.name: a(n) = A284258(n) - A284258(A003961(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
mathematica: Table[If[n == 1, 0, Subtract @@ Map[Count[#, d_ /; d > First[#]^2] &@ FactorInteger[#][[All, 1]] &, {n, Times @@ Map[#1^#2 & @@ # &, FactorInteger[n] /. {p_, e_} /; e > 0 :> {Prime[PrimePi@ p + 1], e}] - Boole[n == 1]}]], {n, 120}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 24 2017 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 24 2017
ext: Secondary offset corrected by _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 15 2017
